11.content: "c'mon Olivia don't be like this you don't mean that"."I'm sorry Rhys your an amazing person and I'll always love you I just don't think we should be together anymore". And with that Olivia blew a kiss and turned off her webcam poor Rhys was shocked the love his life had just left him and he had no idea what's left or even if it's worth going on and continuing. Rhys walked across the room and flopped on his bed not sure what to do."maybe this is all a bad dream I mean Olivia wouldn't really dump me would she ?, she said she loved all the time and she knew how much she meant to me . Oh what's the point I was never good enough for her". And with that Rhys quietly sobbed untill he fell asleep.
11.title: Heart break

111.content: It's been one month since Olivia left Rhys and Rhys was almost over her. One day when walking home from school his phone vibrated it was a text message from talei , an old freind that he hadn't spoken to in ages, she was almost 2 years older then Rhys and from memory was only slightly taller but how could he forget her she was HOT! He remembered her as having black shoulder length her a nice bust and great backside. Rhys got on with her well and they became good freinds, she was a gamer like himself. Rhys knew Tallei knew that he had a thing for her (and he still does) she always used to give him hugs and make sure when this happened that his head ended up her sizable cleavage (CC to be exact) and every once and a while she'd give him the odd love bite but anyway back to the message " hey Rhys it's Tallei I've got some great news I'm coming home!!!!! :) super keen to catch up if we can ". Rhys quickly replied "OMG thats awesome yes we defs have to catch up".
111.title: 1 month later

12.content:
A girl on the track team hates it and finds a new hobby

A shy girl who never made friends discovers that eating could make her popular

A new girl to school gets fattened by her jealous peers

A girl falls in love with a boy who loves fat girls
12.title: 15 year old girl

125.content:
A poor girl whose need for money finds a solution that could compromise her figure.

An infatuated fangirl decides to get fat when her idol gains weight.
125.title: more

choices: Find other ways to make money
1251.content:
Stephanie watched from afar as the other girls shopped for clothes. Coming from a middle class household, Stephanie didn't have the extra cash to purchase the hot trendy clothes of the week. While every other girl was reveling in hot new outfits, Stephanie was stuck wearing the typical tshirt and shorts.

In need of cash but being just a mere high school student, she was unable to get a job. However a fortuitous ad offered Stephanie her opportunity. It was an ad calling for teenage girls to undergo an experiment. It paid very well. With the cash she'd be making, she could easily afford all the latest outfits.

Does Stephanie accept?
1251.title: Poor girl

info.brief_description: Pick your character and fatten them up
info.description: ok so i havnt done any strories in a while and my old ones were pretty terrible so i'm hoping to kick off with this tale please please add and love to see this shape up into a half decent story Im trying to make this as carried story as possible with plot lines that can go anywhere whether they be vore,BBW,expansion,or magic lets make a great story that goes anywhere we want
